subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick reached the quarterfinals of the Eastbourne tennis championships in England, though he needed eight match points to beat Jeremy Chardy, 6-2, 7-6 (6).
snippet: Andy Roddick reached the quarterfinals of the Eastbourne tennis championships in England, though he needed eight match points to beat Jeremy Chardy, 6-2, 7-6 (6).
